markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 338 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Bloodlines**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=6), [Phoenix](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=15)

**Deities**
[Angradd](/Deities.aspx?ID=84), [Chohar](/Deities.aspx?ID=215), [Dahak](/Deities.aspx?ID=150), [Eiseth](/Deities.aspx?ID=169), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16), [The Freeing Flame](/Deities.aspx?ID=231), [The Prismatic Ray](/Deities.aspx?ID=207), [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=159), [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=159)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

A roaring blast of fire appears at a spot you designate, dealing 6d6 fire damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Fireball

summary: An explosion of fire in an area burns creatures.
summary_markdown: An explosion of fire in an area burns creatures.
text: Fireball Source Core Rulebook pg. 338 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Bloodlines Elemental, Phoenix Deities Angradd, Chohar, Dahak, Eiseth, Sarenrae, The Freeing Flame, The Prismatic Ray, Walkena, Walkena Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 500 feet Area 20-foot burst Saving Throw basic Reflex --- A roaring blast of fire appears at a spot you designate, dealing 6d6 fire damage. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
